body: 对应不上就是，人均停留时长的取值是0-1的，但是刻度画出来的是累计用户数的取值刻度。累计用户数的刻度画成了人均停留时长的取值范围
series.data里面的数据和当前的数据是匹配的name=人均停留时长的数据都是0-1的值，name=累计用户数的数据都是一些比较大的值

> Hi. In short, this feature is included in the download from http://echarts.baidu.com/download.html but not for the npm 4.1.0 release.
> 
> This is our release mistake and sorry for the confusion. Due to the long release time since this is our first release after we joined Apache, there are some patches that added after the first release candidate. This makes some new commits are merged in our final release at http://echarts.baidu.com/download.html but npm release is already published. Sorry again and hopefully we will not make this problem again.

官网下周下来的也不支持缩放，下周github上从源码库，test目录里面有个tree-roam页面，也不支持缩放
@pissang 有好方法没
Have the same issue on sunburst I believe

Update: 
I was able to prevent the text from getting cut off by changing legend.padding to 0 (instead of 5), but I still need help with the scrolling icon -- this is shown here: 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10991288/45579577-86ddd180-b83d-11e8-9de9-4002509c9d13.png)
Any help would be really appreciated! Thank you!
这是预期的展现，你希望的展现方式是什么？
如果要实时更新车辆坐标，建议就别加动画了，每次 setOption 更新坐标就行
What series do you use?
可以试试用两个 series 实现
是想要你圈中的这个效果？这个是用 borderColor 和 borderWidth 设置的

I was using the Scatter series. Love it by the way. Another feature I would love to have if possible is a background color behind the Scatter series. We can set height and width, so it would be awesome to place a background color behind the series without having to use a grid. Thanks!
You can try the `markArea` component to highlight the zone with a background color
Can you highlight the entire series? I read the docs a few times on it and considered it but didn't know if it would solve the issue. Thanks!
可以 `label.formatter` 里用 toFixed 保留两位小数点
Gallery 的问题请前往 https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts-gallery-feedback/issues 反馈，我们最近也在解决 gallery 访问不稳定的问题
You can use `top`/`bottom`/`right`/`top` properties to layout the legend.
You can use `top`/`right`/`bottom`/`left` properties to layout each componet. But I don't suggest you displaying so many components in such a small area.
富文本和普通文本目前的处理方式不一样，lineHeight 是只在富文本里才会有效
不可以设置默认缩放比，最后是怎么解决的？

> > You can use `top`/`right`/`bottom`/`left` properties to layout each componet. But I don't suggest you displaying so many components in such a small area.
> 
> I can remove other components, only remain chart content, but it's the same issue:
> 
> ```js
> option = {
>         xAxis: {
>           data: ["shirt","cardign","chiffon shirt","pants","heels","socks"]
>         },
>         yAxis: {},
>         series: [{
>           name: 'Sales',
>           type: 'bar',
>           data: [5, 20, 36, 10, 10, 20]
>         }]
>       }
> ```
> 
> The result like below:
> ![screenshot_20180916_155546](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14355408/45594185-f65ed880-b985-11e8-9ca7-1ab4c1bf0115.png)
> Once you change the height smaller, it should be much better:
> `<div id="chart" style="width: 150px;height: 80px;">`
> ![screenshot_20180916_160107](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14355408/45594243-b3513500-b986-11e8-98db-b36d4da651ac.png)

set the option.grid.top and option.grid.bottom at suitable value , the result will be normal

> > > You can use `top`/`right`/`bottom`/`left` properties to layout each componet. But I don't suggest you displaying so many components in such a small area.
> > 
> > 
> > I can remove other components, only remain chart content, but it's the same issue:
> > ```js
> > option = {
> >         xAxis: {
> >           data: ["shirt","cardign","chiffon shirt","pants","heels","socks"]
> >         },
> >         yAxis: {},
> >         series: [{
> >           name: 'Sales',
> >           type: 'bar',
> >           data: [5, 20, 36, 10, 10, 20]
> >         }]
> >       }
> > ```
> > 
> > 
> > The result like below:
> > ![screenshot_20180916_155546](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14355408/45594185-f65ed880-b985-11e8-9ca7-1ab4c1bf0115.png)
> > Once you change the height smaller, it should be much better:
> > `<div id="chart" style="width: 150px;height: 80px;">`
> > ![screenshot_20180916_160107](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14355408/45594243-b3513500-b986-11e8-98db-b36d4da651ac.png)
> 
> set the option.grid.top and option.grid.bottom at suitable value , the result will be normal

Got it. Thanks.
已按你的方法解决，谢谢!
暂时我们做的就是更新坐标，没用做动画了，但是后期可以加上这个功能吗？我觉得以后像这样的实时动态需求肯定会很多
@LIHAO520 这个 case 里用散点图 + 实时更新坐标 + 过渡动画更合适，`lines` 系列的特效动画不适合展现数据的实时更新动画
@woodstream 是否方便给出你这个问题的完整 option？
有demo吗？散点图做实施动画，那轨迹弄出来效果不是很丑？
4.2.0-rc.1 已经支持 tree 的缩放，见 http://echarts.baidu.com/changelog.html
轨迹可以用没有特效动画的 lines 系列绘制
轨迹能弄出来，就是这个特效动画，让它停，再次重绘的问题，老铁；散点图可以做到这样的效果吗？
这个应该是看 js 通用的解决方案，跟 ECharts 有什么直接的关系呢？
应该算是动画优化
Sorry I can't understand. What do you mean by *it would switch up the axises in the series*?
获得是什么意思，知道这个图片还是要替换？

@pissang Hello, can you confirm if this is  a bug or designed behavior? :smile:
emphasis 下的颜色设为和默认的一样的

@Ovilia 因为echarts一样存在不合预期的问题，尽管这是浏览器兼容性导致的问题。

因为浏览器的异同而导致的表现不一致，在火狐浏览器下，使用Mac触控板在echarts上触发滚轮事件无法与鼠标滚轮触发滚轮事件表现一致，我认为这应该算是一个可以去改善的问题。

Demo Link: [echart](http://www.echartsjs.com/gallery/editor.html?c=candlestick-sh)

在火狐浏览器下打开该link，然后通过F12，将右侧视图right-container添加属性height: 120%，使用mac触控板放大缩小k线图可以体验到我所说的问题。

> 如果认为浏览器兼容性带来的效果差距不属于需解决的问题，可以close此issue
“删除了我的数据就没了啊”是什么意思？你要的效果是到时间后这些点没有涟漪么？可以 setTimeout 里把 `rippleEffect.period` 设为 0 就不动里。tooltip 内容看下 http://echartsjs.com/option.html#series-scatter.tooltip.formatter
不是有 xy 么 http://echartsjs.com/option.html#series-graph.data.x
同问
同问
和 #9085 相似，都需要扇形图支持圆角。既然要求都人多，这个需求就高优支持一下。
我也遇到了，3.7.2，不知道升级是否能解决
老铁，这散点图，能画出动态的实时轨迹特效动画？？？

嗯嗯嗯嗯, 好的好的, 这个最近会有优化么?
可以用 `silent` 禁用交互，但是这样其他效果（比如放大 hover 的扇形块）也会失效
How is this problem solved？

> 可以试试用两个 series 实现

试过了，1、节点结构的不同会导致左右树的根在垂直方向可能不重合；2、根节点存在覆盖问题，即点击根节点只会收放一边的树，另外一边没有反应
同样的问题，求解呀！
http://echartsjs.com/api.html#echartsInstance.setOption 第二个参数设为 true
看了下源码，应该是，[ScrollableLegendView.js#353](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/component/legend/ScrollableLegendView.js#L351)这个赋值有点问题，不过代码有点多，没理透，希望@pissang 能否给个临时解决方案
@fuddong 请问你是怎么解决的？我也出现了同样的问题，并且也是横向的 visualMap

#8413 
可以参考这个

> 确认这是一个 bug，因为 #8971 是因为的，所以之后统一到那个下面继续。
> Duplicate of #8971.

头像真好看
请问，有人修复么
同样的options，复制到官网实例里面画出来的就是对的，在我本地就是反的，要疯了，版本也是最新的。

对源码做了几处修改：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5225853/45622114-7899ea80-bab5-11e8-9aef-519bc9682650.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5225853/45622062-57d19500-bab5-11e8-9fc0-b0b776e493e3.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5225853/45622083-661fb100-bab5-11e8-839c-b5a928480d44.png)
发现有bug的都有一个共性，就是`contentGroup`中符合`itemRect.intersect(winRect)`就一个成员，所以针对`arr===1`的做了特殊处理，暂时解决了我的问题，但是有个不好的就是边界情况，变灰，某些情况下失效，不过比起不可点击，可用性改善了许多。
>  另外，一般不推荐改源码，特别是npm或者yarn管理的项目，每次操作add，install，都会覆盖node_modules中的代码，另外我的项目属于内部产品的场景，生产情况下的其他情形我没测试过，客官们谨慎处理
我觉得你的关注点有点跑偏了，增量式数据更新是合理的做法，每次setOption全部数据重新加载才是不好的，绘制轨迹实际上有很多种方式，可以把你想要的功能借助于现有的方法来实现，比如重新构造渲染的数据结构，或者仔细看一下例子找找适合你的方法
程序的数据加载可以改进一下，不用每次$.ajax都重新构造数据，可以只更新特定的option参数，然后再调用setOption
@pissang is there any chance of solving this?

I think this doc will be useful

Thanks for the reply, I've also read that doc a few times, it's all for labels and components that have a formatter. It doesn't apply to the title component. I studied over the title component code, looks like rich text isn't being used: https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/component/title.js

However, I'm not an expert in this repo so maybe rich text is enabled for the title component.

This would be why it's not working. I'm on the SVG renderer. I had to dig to find this, but now I understand. Thanks. Hope this helps someone else.

问题可能找到了，我的场景是这样的，有个下拉框，每次选择2个指标展示，当连续2次选择computed出来的option有相同的数据（比如说series[]里面某项）的时候貌似不会完全触发重绘，在setoption添加第二个参数true就解决了。不过话说回来，我的option确实已经watch到了修改，但是没能完全重绘。
